summary: A day laborer is badly beaten, and a young man nurses him back to health.
cast: Kang-sheng Lee|Shiang-chyi Chen|Norman Atun|Pearlly Chua|Lee-Lin Liew|Leonard Tee|Su-Yee Toh|Kok-Fai Chiew|Rong-Sin Chan|Kok-Choy Loh|Shiva|Mohammad Rani Bin Baker|Rusli Bin Abdul Rahim|Azman Hassan|Hariry Jalil|Mohammad Abuha Bin Rosli
title: Hei yan quan
